cluster_description: Agrupa políticas de atención a poblaciones específicas

weight_rationale.PA01: Peso medio por transversalidad de género
weight_rationale.PA05: Mayor peso por obligatoriedad en municipios PDET - Decreto 893/2017 y concentración de víctimas del conflicto armado
weight_rationale.PA06: Peso medio por prioridad de protección
weight_rationale.pdet_note: En contextos PDET, PA05 tiene peso elevado debido a mandato legal de incorporación de PATR y alta concentración de población victimizada

pdet_specific_norms: Acuerdo de Paz - Punto 1 (Reforma Rural Integral)
normative_alignment.pdet_note: Para municipios PDET, se valora positivamente la mención explícita de PATR, Plan Marco de Implementación y Decreto 893/2017

text.es: ¿El plan integra coherentemente la atención a mujeres, víctimas, y niñez/juventud con enfoque diferencial?
text.en: Does the plan coherently integrate attention to women, victims, and children/youth with a differential approach?

pdet_enrichment.contextual_scope: Municipalities within 170 PDET territories across 16 subregions

territorial_markers.veredas: PDET covers approximately 11,000 veredas - territorial disaggregation to vereda level is highly valued
subregions: Alto Patía y Norte del Cauca
territorial_markers.ethnic_territories: Resguardos indígenas, consejos comunitarios afrocolombianos, zonas de reserva campesina

consumer_integrity_requirements.scope: Plans must explicitly address population groups in PDET contexts with territorial specificity
consumer_integrity_requirements.value: Enrichment provides mechanisms to detect PATR integration, ethnic consultation, and rural disaggregation
consumer_integrity_requirements.capability: Patterns enable identification of institutional actors (ART, Unidad de Víctimas) and financing sources (SGR-Paz, Obras por Impuestos)
consumer_integrity_requirements.integrity: Cross-validation with PATR initiatives (32,808 total) and 8 PDET pillars ensures coherence

key_indicators_pdet.ethnic_initiative_lag: 25.15% of ethnic PDET initiatives have active implementation route
key_indicators_pdet.population_coverage: 6.6 million people (24% of Colombia's rural population)

validation_enhancement.territorial_coherence: Verify mention of specific PDET subregion and veredas/corregimientos
validation_enhancement.institutional_articulation: Detect references to ART, OCAD Paz, Unidad de Víctimas, ethnic consultation bodies
validation_enhancement.financing_traceability: Identify SGR-Asignación para la Paz, Obras por Impuestos, or PATR initiative codes
validation_enhancement.pillar_alignment: Map interventions to PDET's 8 pillars, especially Pillar 8 (Reconciliation) for groups poblacionales
